com.aevi.printing

Class PrintService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.printing.PrintService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AeviService

    public class PrintService
extends java.lang.Object
implements AeviService
    The PrintService class is the main interface for executing Print Request. In a situation where there is only one printer available it is sufficient to send a print command containing a PrintPayload. Otherwise it is necessary to first connect to the relevant printer. It is possible to get a list of printers using the queryAvailablePrinters method.

    Please see the PrintServiceProvider on how to initialize this service.

    See Also:
    TerminalConfiguration.isPrintApiUsable()

    • Method Detail

      • createIntent

        public static android.content.Intent createIntent()
        Creates an Intent that can be used to bind the print service. Please refer to the PrintServiceProvider to obtain an instance of this service.
        Returns:
        an Intent that can be used to bind the print service.

      • print

        public int print(PrintPayload printPayload)
        Prints the given PrintPayload using the default printer
        Parameters:
        printPayload - the pay load to print
        Returns:
        the print job id.
        Throws:
        AeviServiceConnectionException - when unable to connect to the printer service

      • preview

        public android.graphics.Bitmap preview(PrintPayload printPayload,
                              PrinterSettings printerSettings)
        Previews the given PrintPayload
        Parameters:
        printPayload - the pay load to print
        printerSettings - the settings of the printer that will be emulated in the preview
        Returns:
        a bitmap containing the preview.
        Throws:
        AeviServiceConnectionException - if unable to connect to the printer service
        AeviServiceException - if there was a problem during printing

      • registerUpdateListener

        public void registerUpdateListener(PrintCallbackListener listener)
        Registers the PrintCallbackListener for print job state change events.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register for print job state change events

      • unregisterUpdateListener

        public void unregisterUpdateListener(PrintCallbackListener listener)
        Un-registers the PrintCallbackListener for print job state change events.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to un-register for print job state change events

      • getDefaultPrinterSettings

        public PrinterSettings getDefaultPrinterSettings()
        Returns the default printer settings. If there is no response from the service implementation a AeviServiceConnectionException is thrown. If the implementing print service library is not installed a PrintingServiceNotInstalledException is thrown.
        Returns:
        the default printer settings.
        Throws:
        AeviServiceConnectionException - when unable to connected to the PrinterService
